abstract.t: Mobile Ad-hoc Networks (MANETs) comprise asymmetric reachability link types that connect MANET routers, and connect to the global Internet via zero or more MANET gateways. MANET routers with nodes on downstream-attached links that require global Internet access must have a way to automatically provision globally routable and unique IP addresses/prefixes. This document specifies mechanisms for MANET autoconfiguration (AUTOCONF). Solutions for both IPv4 and IPv6 are given.
